cause.description:
This is a organization for all kinds of people. Whether you are black, white Latino, Asian, Jewish, Christian, Male, Female... You are welcome. In this organization, we come together as one and discuss issues we may never get the chance to touch upon, although we ALWAYS think about them. This is where we can speak freely. Some people may get personal, so it IS VERY imparative that we respect others, in order for everyone to feel comfortable. We seek freedon everyday of our lives, and this group is one place you can find a taste of it.
1. Spread and educate others in cultural and ethical diversity
2. Raise the standard of level of tolerance amongst teens, young adults, and adults alike.
3. Share, embrace, and enlighten one another on any topic regarding ethnicity, culture, and other social issues.
cause.mission: spread, educate on and embrace cultural diversity.
cause.name: Freedom Seekers Movement
